summary: This document appears to be a forwarded email chain from May 2020, showing a threatening message sent to Mark Epstein. The message, sent via text, threatens the death of a family member or Mark Epstein himself. The email is forwarded to the FBI's New York Division.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: He is the recipient of a threatening text message forwarded to the FBI. The message threatens him or a family member with death.

events.title: Threatening message sent to Mark Epstein
events.description: A text message is sent to Mark Epstein threatening that 'One of your family members will die soon. Or yourself'.

events.title: Email forwarded to FBI
events.description: Mark Epstein forwards the threatening message to the FBI's New York Division, asking 'Can't the FBI do anything about this?'

keyFacts: Mark Epstein received a death threat via text message on May 24, 2020.
The threat stated 'One of your family members will die soon. Or yourself'.
Mark Epstein forwarded the threat to the FBI's New York Division on May 25, 2020, seeking intervention.
The document is part of an email chain forwarded within the FBI on May 26, 2020.
